title: Alice in Wonderland
text: Alice falls into a rabbit hole dwarf and enters a world full of imagination.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring.
text: An unusual alliance of man, elf, dwarf, wizard and hobbit seek to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Book of the Ice and Fire.
text: An elegant alliance of a woman, a dwarf and a dragon, fighting to rule the seven kingdoms.
